question: Bollywood star Katrina Kaif was appointed as the Brand ambassador fr which company?
explanation: Lenskart announced that, Bollywood actress, Katrina Kaif will be the brand ambassador of Lenskart for the next two years and would feature in the brand's new campaign. Lenskart was founded in 2010. Lenskart is present in more than 350 stores across more than 80 cities in India.
